name: Brick Filler
description:
Made for #AGBIC Jam 2020 in three weeks, inspired by this game cover.

Drag and drop lego blocks from their initial position into the grid.

Fill rows and/or columns to get points. You lose points when you aren't able to use a given block in its time limit.

Request a new block with the appropriate button.

After two minutes, your time is up and you are awarded a score equal to the number of rows and columns you completed!

Feel free to boast your highest score in the comments!
Graphical assets from GameSupplyGuy. Music by Antti Luode.

Future plans: multiplayer
